data.eml:eml: Redescription of Parapagurapseudopsis carinatus (Tanaidacea: Apseudomorpha) and remarks about the male form

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Kátia Christol Dos, Pires-Vanin, Ana Maria Setubal (2006): Redescription of Parapagurapseudopsis carinatus (Tanaidacea: Apseudomorpha) and remarks about the male form. Zootaxa 1363: 39-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174727
